item.title: Unlocking Bootloader on Redmi Note 8: A Complete Guide
item.description: This blog covers the detailed steps to unlock the bootloader on your Redmi Note 8, along with the benefits and risks of doing so. A personal take on experimenting with custom ROMs and modifications.

item.title: Shivam Vishnu Lavhale
item.description:
Introduction

  • I am a Budding CSE student with skills in Web Development, Linux and C Programming. Passionate about open-source software and system-level development. Currently, I am an UnderGrad studying at Shri Sant Gajanan Maharaj College of Engineering, Shegaon

  • I like to EXPLORE.

  • My Tech journey started as soon as I got my own Android Phone (Redmi Note 8) back in 2019 (Corona-Time). I got curious so Learnt many things, bricked my device a few times as well, but in the end, I made sure that the performance is never compromised. Check my Blog.
